title: Screen Glitch - Alt+Clicking map

body:
Hello!

This is only a recent glitch. I just got myself a 4k 60hz TV. All is fine and dandy excepting this glitch. The glitch only shows up in Full Screen or Borderless, and the game is fine in windowed mode.

Here's the dealio:

Every time I Alt+Click the screen, you can see that it stretches and the colours change. I also tried holding down the click and it persists until I release the click.

If anyone can help it would be appreciated. I'm not a big fan of the big white window bar at the top of my screen while playing.

Cheers

replies.body: 4K is not currently supported and can cause issues, though this visual issue seems pretty severe.  I suggest reaching out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get better on context on the issue.  If possible, try using another monitor to see if it reproduces the issue.  We'll get back to you individually through your ticket!
